channel.title: DragoniteX Need Team!
channel.description:
Website is *
We use AirScape as a Source, and blank client as a client. So credits to the makers!
This is not advertising!! (:
The Staff we are looking for. -Coder for General Stuff(OPEN) -Co-Owner (OPEN) -Admins (OPEN), (OPEN) -Mods (OPEN), (OPEN), (OPEN) -Beta Testers (OPEN), (OPEN) -Graphics Coder (OPEN) -Item Coder (OPEN) -Client Coder (OPEN) -Webclient Coder (OPEN)
If interested in any positions please email me at framirez1997@hotmail.com Thanks!
Please don't flame. This is my first source I have worked on and i think I did good, perfected a lot skills and more! But if you see stuff that I should work on please point it out I like Suggestions.
Some Pictures!!!
[img]http://i1135.photobucket.com/albums/m628/zed159879/DragoniteX%20V2%20ScreenShots/1.png[/img] [img]http://i1135.photobucket.com/albums/m628/zed159879/DragoniteX%20V2%20ScreenShots/6.png[/img] [img]http://i1135.photobucket.com/albums/m628/zed159879/DragoniteX%20V2%20ScreenShots/15.png[/img] [img]http://i1135.photobucket.com/albums/m628/zed159879/DragoniteX%20V2%20ScreenShots/10.png[/img] [img]http://i1135.photobucket.com/albums/m628/zed159879/DragoniteX%20V2%20ScreenShots/3.png[/img] [img]http://i1135.photobucket.com/albums/m628/zed159879/DragoniteX%20V2%20ScreenShots/16.png[/img] [img]http://i1135.photobucket.com/albums/m628/zed159879/DragoniteX%20V2%20ScreenShots/12.png[/img] [img]http://i1135.photobucket.com/albums/m628/zed159879/DragoniteX%20V2%20ScreenShots/8.png[/img] [img]http://i1135.photobucket.com/albums/m628/zed159879/DragoniteX%20V2%20ScreenShots/4.png[/img] [img]http://i1135.photobucket.com/albums/m628/zed159879/DragoniteX%20V2%20ScreenShots/19.png[/img] [img]http://i1135.photobucket.com/albums/m628/zed159879/DragoniteX%20V2%20ScreenShots/11.png[/img] [img]http://i1135.photobucket.com/albums/m628/zed159879/DragoniteX%20V2%20ScreenShots/7.png[/img] [img]http://i1135.photobucket.com/albums/m628/zed159879/DragoniteX%20V2%20ScreenShots/18.png[/img] [img]http://i1135.photobucket.com/albums/m628/zed159879/DragoniteX%20V2%20ScreenShots/14.png[/img] [img]http://i1135.photobucket.com/albums/m628/zed159879/DragoniteX%20V2%20ScreenShots/2.png[/img] [img]http://i1135.photobucket.com/albums/m628/zed159879/DragoniteX%20V2%20ScreenShots/17.png[/img] [img]http://i1135.photobucket.com/albums/m628/zed159879/DragoniteX%20V2%20ScreenShots/13.png[/img] [img]http://i1135.photobucket.com/albums/m628/zed159879/DragoniteX%20V2%20ScreenShots/9.png[/img] [img]http://i1135.photobucket.com/albums/m628/zed159879/DragoniteX%20V2%20ScreenShots/5.png[/img]
- 24/7 No Lag - Great Support Staff & Great Owner/Coder - Regularly Updated - Great Pking Community & Clans From RuneScape - Fully Working Skilling & Combat System - Bonus 12x Experience on weekends - Stable Economy & Active Market - God Wars - Fight Caves - Fully working Spirit Beast/ Corp Beast - Barrows (With easy acsess) Still need spade, or talk to guy to teleport you there. - Active, Friendly Community Forums - PK Points With Rewards - Custom items (such as the Flame Bow, Dragon Plate, Bandos Warspear, Chaotic weapons, and Dungeoneering Armor, Slayer helmet and PvP Armors!) - Working Spirit shields (new bonuses & the actual shield bonuses) - Daily Serverwide Events
-NO LAGG -Dedicated Server - 8GB of RAM.
-Owner Fernando

item.title: DragoniteX Need Team!
item.dc:creator: @Ix_Soulcist_xI Soulcist
item.description:
@Ix_Soulcist_xI wrote:

You could start out with updating the server to more modern versions of the 317 or at least keep it at a 317 revision and not add that stuff that isn’t the revision.

You could end up changing the home, and remove the customs from the client and server. Then I suppose fix up the networking and other various things to improve the server.

Good luck with the development.

Read full topic
